CustomField.formula:
IMAGE( CASE( IF( (LimitsDmlRowsUsed__c / LimitsDmlRowsMax__c * 100) >= 90, "red", IF( (LimitsDmlRowsUsed__c / LimitsDmlRowsMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsDmlRowsUsed__c / LimitsDmlRowsMax__c * 100) >= 80, "yellow", "green" ) ), "green", "/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "yellow", "/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "red", "/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "/s.gif" ), '', 16, 16 )
+ ' ' +
TEXT(LimitsDmlRowsUsed__c) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsDmlRowsMax__c) + ' (' + TEXT(ROUND(LimitsDmlRowsUsed__c / LimitsDmlRowsMax__c * 100, 2)) + '%)'
CustomField.label: DML Rows
